thread.title: Hannah Bury
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Hannah Bury

author: Hannah Bury
title: Hannah Bury
text: Easy to use website, clear instructions. Quick prompt shipment & delivery especially during the Christmas period. Product packaged well too. Definitely recommend and will be using again in the future.
